sect2.title: 内容
sect2.para: Fetchmail 包括 fetchmail 和 fetchmailconf.

sect3.title: fetchmail
sect3.para: When executed as a user, this will source that users ~/.fetchmailrc 和 download the appropriate mail.

sect3.title: fetchmailconf
sect3.para: This program provides a Tk GUI interface to your ~/.fetchmailrc making it much easier to configure. However you will require, Python, 和 it must have the Tkinker module available.
